      • timeCheck

        public static boolean timeCheck()
        The timeCheck() method is meant to be an inclusive method that can be used anyhwhere in the application to check whether the current time has any ongoing classes.
        Returns:
        Time Check Positive or Negative

      • FifteenMinActivate

        public static void FifteenMinActivate()
        There are times when the instructor is late or not present during a lecture. This method is geared towards activating the the AMS 15 minutes into class automatically so students who've attended may mark their presence in the system.

      • toMins

        public static int toMins(java.lang.String s)
        This method is meant for the timeCheck method. It returns the minute format for DD:HH:MM
        Parameters:
        s - This is a method used to turn HH:MM:SS format into one int number in MINUTES only. It helps with time comparisons.
        Returns:
        HoursInMins
